title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, offering sync/async clients and streaming support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, chat, embeddings and tools support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama, covering chat, generate, embeddings and model ops.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama to use local models for QA, RAG and agents.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with examples: RAG, voice chat, function calling, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any channel.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: NVIDIA GPU optimized Docker stack (TensorRT-LLM + Ollama) for max throughput.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Minimal RAG question-answering demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with any Ollama model via slash-command or app mention.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama in CI pipelines for LLM-based testing or code review.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for code, chat, role-play and multilingual use.
